Text:
Any one have this working at all?
And any advice? e.g back up files & etc.
Direct download can be found here http://imzdl.tumblr.com/
FAKE! as 10.8.1 is officially out from apple. how can 10.8.2 be here.

pulkit007: 10.7.2 Developer build has been released
osxdaily.com/2012/08/23/os-x-10-8-2-developer-build-12c31a-includes-facebook-integration/
iMZDL posts that 10.8.2 (12C31A) was released on 8/23/12.
I installed the 10.8.2 from imzdl website and it works without any problem.I can see they have added facebook on the icloud sync.
Sorry i didnt meant to offend u guys. what i meant was, this is not the official release which has been out" sorry for intrusion :)
@mnfesq Wikipedia also posted that mountain lion 10.8.2 was released as an developer build on 8/24/2012. This torrent was released after one day from the release.

iMZDL is safe, i think you guys might download safely from there..

iMZDL.com/dl/

There you find all betas, including mountain lion, and 10.7.5 Lion, And iOS 6 too!
thanks much peh - this update fixed the nvidia crash problem under mountain lion on my macbook pro.

@Mbradna - Same as any update my friend. Make sure you run a backup before you run the installer and you'll be fine.

This is confirmed working 100%

Thanks uploader.

For anyone who is not sure - This is a BETA build of 10.8.2. It's been officially seeded to devs for about a week or so now. It's not fake and works 100%. DO backup before you update though.
Well, thats a shame.. I didn't back my hard drive up. You live and you learn.
can i have full facebook support in this update....i mean can i see my facebook notifications,friend request all these things...

Hmmmm... I have a 2007 Quad Mac Pro, modded Chameleon boot loader to run Mountain Lion as my EFI is only 32 bit... This update indeed gave me FaceBook integration and even updated my address book with all my friends on FB... message center works great, even synced my calendar with friends birthdays, and events... clicking on a message takes you right to the FB post... pretty cool, Thanks :)
